Package co.unicauca.microservice.apirest.model.service

Interface iProductService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductService
public interface iProductService
Service interface for managing Product entities.

  • Method Details

    • getProducts

      List<Product> getProducts()
      Retrieves all products from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all products.

    • getProduct

      Product getProduct(Long id)
      Retrieves a specific product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The product with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getProductByName

      List<Product> getProductByName(String name)
      Retrieves products by their name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product(s) to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of products matching the specified name.

    • getProductByCategory

      List<Product> getProductByCategory(String nameCategory)
      Retrieves products by a specific category name.
      Parameters:
      nameCategory - The name of the category to filter products by.
      Returns:
      A list of products associated with the specified category.

    • deleteProduct

      String deleteProduct(Long id)
      Deletes a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to delete.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the deletion operation.

    • postProduct

      String postProduct(Product product)
      Creates a new product.
      Parameters:
      product - The product object to be created.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the creation operation.

    • putProduct

      String putProduct(Product product, Long id)
      Updates an existing product with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      product - The updated product object.
      id - The ID of the product to update.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the update operation.
